title.rendered: RHINO 4X4 ADVENTURE SPORTS BAR Suit Ford Ranger PX2

content.rendered:
The Rhino 4×4 Adventure roll bar is our Evolved version of the classic favourite.

Give your truck a one-of-a-kind look with a Rhino 4×4 Adventure roll bar. This roll bar is finished in a matt black powder coat. It is made to fit a wide variety of trucks and comes with mounting brackets and hardware.

Make sure to install the Rhino 4×4 roll bar before your next big adventure. This roll bar allows you to load up to 100 kg of cargo in the cargo basket.

The cargo basket can be removed easily due to our modular design. If you’re planning some night time off-roading then install two spot lights or a light bar on the light bar bracket – up to 50″.

This roll bar is compatible with most retractable, roll up and some folding load bed covers.

  • Carry up to 100 kg of cargo
  • Matt black powder coat finish
  • Constructed from four-inch steel tubing and plate – includes mounting brackets
  • Drilling required
  • Limited lifetime warranty
  • Blocks vehicle’s third brake light
